description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. How long can you last, climbing up the endless tower of falling blocks? Falling blocks is a game where you climb up a randomly generated tower of blocks, either trying to get as as high as possible, or to tag as many blocks before the time limit expires. It's a fast paced platformer which always has you looking for another route up the tower.
